clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Placenta is unremarkable and normally located.
Breast tissue shows unremarkable lesion measuring 33.41 mm.
Uterus appears isoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 35.48 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates mildly thickened, no hydronephrosis.
Left kidney shows normal, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
